folder: Arthur Kill Road & South Bridge Street, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - South Bridge Street
text:
(1) Arthur Kill Road, north from South Bridge Street.
The area in the immediate foreground is new (1939)
spanned by the Outerbridge Crossing.
Sept. 21, 1926
P. L. Sperr

(2)Part of the Bridge Park is residential development,
slightly north of the bridge.
Sept. 21, 1926
P. L. Sperr

folder: South Bridge Street & Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: South Bridge Street - Arthur Kill Road
text:
South Bridge Street, east from Arthur Kill Road. On the left is the Outerbridge Crossing, viewing toward the
bridge plaza.
June 25, 1935
